targets.query:
from(bucket: "ups-nut")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "2e21aa1143b8")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "Back-UPS NS 1500M2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_OL"] == "true")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: float(v: r._value) / 100.0 * 900.0
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ups-nut")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "Eaton 9PX 1500 RT")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_OL"] == "true")

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({

  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "cpu"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "moremi")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "proxmox")

SELECT count("action") FROM "tail_ip_block_log" WHERE ("host" =~ /^ifa\.local\.xeolab\.homes$/ AND "action" = 'block' AND "direction" = 'in') AND time >= now() - 24h and time <= now() GROUP BY time(10m), "geoip_code"

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "moremi")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "moremi")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])
